no_contradiction: There is no composition of δ, Φ, Π that produces ⊥ from ⊤ within the foundational axioms.
fixed_points: Π has at least one fixed point Π(s*) = s* in every Ω-admissible domain.
closure: For any s in S, δ(s), Φ(s), Π(s) are in S or in an explicitly Ω-marked extension.
associativity_on_domain: Composition of δ, Φ, Π is associative on admissible states: (A∘B)∘C = A∘(B∘C) for A,B,C in {δ,Φ,Π}.
